name: Memories of Ages
description:
A horde survival game where you experience the nostalgia of your life as it flashes before your eyes. Duck, dodge, and gain access to more weapons and powerful upgrades on level up as you age. Though time is ticking and eventually it will come for you.

The first Jam game by:

Jamie N 

Charlie Taylor 

Sami Najed

Assets Credits

______________

-Art by Jamie N, and Sami Najed
-Classical Game Music Arranged by Charlie Taylor ( each is a mashup of two nostalgic game themes, feel free to leave your guesses in the comments.)
-Sfx by Charlie Taylor and Sami Najed

Sourced Assets

-Additional sfx from soundly

-Font by Hewett Tsoi

-Mystery Steve Jobs that magically appeared in Unity

-Silly Bandz and Nerf Gun Bullet image rights are reserved to their respective owners.
